price: 53. Mpe soki batangeli bango yango balobi: Tondimi na yango ya sólo, ezali bosembo oyo ewuti epai ya Nkolo wa biso, tosila kokoma bamizilima yambo ete ekomela biso.
arabic: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
